channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 08:24 The threat of artobrats in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community. Solve for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 08:24 The threat of artobrats in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community. Solve for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 08:04 The threat of shelling! Now in Pokrovskaya territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter!
